des:
Color Together is a skill where kids can color a picture with Alexa. Simply...

1) Choose a picture.

Examples:
- house
- sailboat
- shapes
- teacher

2) Tell her what section to color.

Examples:
- roof
- door
- sail
- square
- circle
- hair
- necklace

3) Tell her what color to make it

Examples:
- blue
- fuchsia
- violet
- emerald

and see how the picture turns out. It's a fun skill filled with quirky poems, feel-good music, and inspiring stories read by children book authors that will make coloring even more enjoyable for your child.

Some of the commands your child can use are:
- Let's color the house
- Color the door brown
- What pictures can we color
- I want to color another picture
- I'm done

Coloring activities provide young children with an opportunity to develop fine motor skills, eye-hand coordination, and better focus. The back and forth verbal exchange with Alexa gives kids a sense of companionship while they color. Color Together is available to color any day, at any time.

This skill is best experienced with a visual device or with one of our coloring sheets.

MySmarticles is a company committed to providing the most amazing experience for children everywhere. We are a resource for parents, teachers, and educators who believe all kids deserve a chance at the future they dream of.
